scenario.name: Sipwise NGCP Benchmark UAS Responder
scenario.send: SUBSCRIBE sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]> From: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=1]>;tag=[pid] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] SUBSCRIBE Max-Forwards: 70 Event: presence Accept: application/pidf+xml Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Expires: 30 Content-Length: 0

ACK sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=1]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 [last_Via:] From: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=1]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=1]>;tag=[pid] To: <sip:[field0 file="callee.csv" line=0]@[field3 file="callee.csv" line=0]>[peer_tag_param] Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: [cseq] ACK Contact: <sip:[local_ip]:[local_port];transport=[transport]> Max-Forwards: 70 Content-Length: 0
